attributes.action: make it illegal not to thank people when they let you go whislt driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for too long our roads have been littered with people who are rude and impolite.  When i wait for someone and give them the right of way even if it is not there, too many times i have recieved no thanks or recognition.  All it is is a simple hand gesture, no thanks should have  fine. thank you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
